ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisAppointment of MICHAEL BINDER of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a permanent member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months; and designation of MICHAEL BINDER as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission.
